section1.title: Almond Specialists
section1.description: With years of experience in almond cultivation and commercialization, we offer the best varieties on the market. Our passion is helping you find the perfect variety for your agricultural operation.

features.varieties_desc: Wide catalog of almond varieties adapted to different climates and soils

features.sustainable_desc: Agricultural practices respectful of the environment

section2.title: Our Experience
section2.para1: We have spent decades devoted to almond cultivation and commercialization. Our experience allows us to select and offer the most productive varieties adapted to the conditions of each region.
section2.para2: We work directly with certified nurseries and apply rigorous quality controls at all stages of the process, from rootstock selection to final delivery.
section2.para3: Our commitment is to provide plants of the highest quality, accompanied by the best technical advice to ensure the success of your plantation.

marcona.name: Marcona
marcona.description: High-quality almond variety, known for its sweet flavor and soft texture. Ideal for direct consumption and fine pastry.
marcona.characteristics: Rounded shape, large size, hard shell, high oil content

guara.name: Guara
guara.description: High productivity almond with excellent adaptation. Highly valued in industry for its consistency and constant quality.
guara.characteristics: Semi-hard shell, elongated kernel, late flowering, frost resistant

largueta.name: Largueta
largueta.description: Traditional Spanish variety highly appreciated for its elongated shape and intense flavor. Perfect for nougat and sugared almonds.
largueta.characteristics: Very elongated shape, soft shell, characteristic flavor, early flowering

avijor.name: Avijor
avijor.description: Modern self-fertile variety with high production. Excellent agronomic behavior and great adaptability.
avijor.characteristics: Self-fertile, high productivity, large kernel, mid-late flowering

vairo.name: Vairo
vairo.description: Soft-shell almond with excellent caliber. Very productive and late flowering, ideal for frost-prone areas.
vairo.characteristics: Very soft shell, large and flat kernel, very late flowering

soleta.name: Soleta
soleta.description: Self-fertile variety with late flowering. Excellent productivity and adaptation to different climatic conditions.
soleta.characteristics: Self-fertile, late flowering, hard shell, high yield
